mapper.insert: insert into qrcode_table (qrcode_id, table_id, table_status, create_time, update_time) values (#{qrcodeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tableId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tableStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now(),now())

insert into qrcode_table
qrcode_id,
table_id,
table_status,
create_time, update_time
#{qrcodeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{tableId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{tableStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
now(), now()
mapper.select:
insert into qrcode_table (qrcode_id, table_id, create_time, update_time) values
(#{queryId},#{item},now(),now())
mapper.update: update qrcode_table set table_status = #{status}, update_time = now() where table_id = #{tableId}
mapper.select: select qt.table_id,ti.table_info_name,qt.table_status,qt.update_time from qrcode_table as qt join table_info as ti on ti.table_info_id = qt.table_id where qrcode_id = #{codeId}
